examples.translation: 这幅画的原作在大英博物馆内。
examples.last: picture is in the British Museum.

examples.translation: 房子原先的主人搬出去了。
examples.last: owner of the house moved out.

adj: being or productive of something fresh and unusual; or being as first made or thought of
preceding all others in time or being as first made or performed
(of e.g. information) not secondhand or by way of something intermediary
not derived or copied or translated from something else; not an adaptation"
n: an original creation (i.e., an audio recording) from which copies can be made
something that serves as a model or a basis for making copies

adj: 最初的, 原始的; 有独创性的, 原版的
n: 原件, 原稿; 有独创性的人, 怪人
